activities: AscendantFX is a payment service provider that offers foreign exchange hedging solutions to corporate clients that are sending or receiving payment from abroad.  For the purpose of having a US-EU Safe Harbor certification, AscendantFX receives personal information for receiving incoming funds from businesses/individuals in the EU/EEA or Switzerland on behalf of US based corporations that are clients of AscendantFX.  Personal information is received pursuant to AscendantFX obligations for compliance under the Bank Secrecy Act.  Personal information is obtained at the time a US corporate client instructs AscendantFX to receive funds on its behalf from someone in the EU, EEA or Switzerland.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Private information of individuals and individuals on behalf of corporations and businesses and information relating to financial transactions.
privacyprograms: AscendantFX maintains a self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles.
recoursemech: AscendantFX refers unresolved privacy complaints under the US-EU and US-Swiss Safe Harbor Principles to an independent dispute resolution mechanism, the BBB EU SAFE HARBOR, operated by the Council of Better Business Bureaus.
